name: PBEmulator
body:
### What's it this?
This is server emulator MMO-FPS [Point Blank](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Point_Blank_(2008_video_game)).

### Functional
Server is implemented by approximately 75-80%
1. PvP 8 x 8
2. PvE 4 x BOTS
3. Shop (~85%)
4. Clans (~45-50%)
5. Inventory (~80%)
6. Friends (~60%)
7. Private Messages (~50%)
8. Missions (~80%)
Other stuff

### How to setup and play
1. Install [MySQL](https://www.mysql.com/)
2. Install [.NET Framework](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718)
3. Change settings from Settings.ini to your params
4. Install [Apache](https://httpd.apache.org/)
5. Install site from /Web/
6. Change configs for site (core/config.php)
7. Create account (localhost/reg.php)
8. Run servers (start_all_servers.cmd)
9. If you correctly set up, all will work

### Authors
OZ-Network.RU(@oznetwork)

### Support or Contact
@foxovsky
